document_data.name: Joril Frostbeard
document_data.home: [[Dorn's Deep|Wyrm's Tooth glacier]], [[Spine of the World]]
document_data.mainbody: '''Joril Frostbeard''' was a mighty [[frost giant]] leader, who lived with his clan in a cavern within the [[Dorn's Deep|Wyrm's Tooth glacier]] atop the [[Spine of the World]].
document_data.History: Joril's [[magic]]al [[dagger]] was lost when he was killed by a group of adventurers. Some time later, the dagger reappeared in [[Kuldahar]] and was reforged there, so that it could be used by [[human]]s and human-sized creatures as a [[greatsword|two-handed sword]]. When striking a target, it had a chance to confuse them.
